definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: SiC is a good substrate material for laser mirrors with higher therma…
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅是較優秀的反射鏡材料。

sentences.english: In addition its excellent conductivity avoids the introduction of temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 而碳化硅卓越的導熱性則避免了引入溫度梯度。

sentences.english: A new method was applied to the test of corrosion resistance of SiC-Si3N4 material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氮化硅結合碳化硅材料耐腐蝕性能的測試方法。

sentences.english: A trademark used for an abrasive of silicon carbide crystals.
sentences.chinese: 金剛砂一種碳化硅晶體磨料的商標名。

sentences.english: The three mirrors are directly mounted on the Silicon Carbide plates using titanium bolts.
sentences.chinese: 三塊反射鏡使用鈦制螺栓直接安裝在碳化硅的端板上。

sentences.english: The fabrication process and application of silicon carbide mirror are presented.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了碳化硅反射鏡材料常用製備方法的特點。

sentences.english: Moreover, yt can also be used in the manufacture of refractory products and electric products etc.
sentences.chinese: 另外，黑色碳化硅可用於生產耐火產品及電子產品等。

sentences.english: Research of the surface modification for two kinds of silicon carbide mirror in common use.
sentences.chinese: 兩種常用碳化硅反射鏡基底表面改性的研究。

sentences.english: The corrosion of clay-bonded SiC is grain boundary erosion.
sentences.chinese: 鋁液對粘土結合碳化硅侵蝕屬於晶間腐蝕。

sentences.english: SiC synthesis is a high-energy-costing industry.
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅生產是高耗能行業。

sentences.english: High-quality silicon carbide edge rounding media is manufactured to create an angular, blocky shape.
sentences.chinese: 高品質的碳化硅邊緣爲一個角塊形狀。

sentences.english: The unidirectional short silicon carbide fibers reinforced-glass-ceramic matrix composite specimens were fabricated.
sentences.chinese: 製備了單向短碳化硅纖維增強玻璃陶瓷的複合材料。

sentences.english: The densification of SiC composite powders was carried out by vacuum pressureless sintering.
sentences.chinese: 採用真空無壓燒結進行碳化硅複合粉體的燒結緻密化。

sentences.english: Parts can be self-tumbled with silicon carbide tumbling grit when aggressive deburring, scale removal and edge rounding is required.
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅翻滾砂礫時積極去毛刺時，大規模清理表面。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
